collections.description: Islamic remembrances to recite in the morning

adhkar.text: اللهم بك أصبحنا وبك أمسينا وبك نحيا وبك نموت وإليك النشور
adhkar.englishTranslation: O Allah, by You we enter the morning, and by You we enter the evening, and by You we live and by You we die, and unto You is our resurrection.

adhkar.text: سبحان الله وبحمده عدد خلقه ورضا نفسه وزنة عرشه ومداد كلماته
adhkar.englishTranslation: Glory be to Allah and His praise, by the number of His creation and His pleasure, and by the weight of His throne and the ink of His words.

adhkar.text: لا إله إلا الله وحده لا شريك له له الملك وله الحمد وهو على كل شيء قدير
adhkar.englishTranslation: There is none worthy of worship except Allah alone, without partner. To Him belongs the dominion and all praise is due to Him, and He is over all things capable.

collections.description: Islamic remembrances to recite in the evening

adhkar.text: اللهم بك أمسينا وبك أصبحنا وبك نحيا وبك نموت وإليك المصير
adhkar.englishTranslation: O Allah, by You we enter the evening, and by You we enter the morning, and by You we live and by You we die, and unto You is the return.

adhkar.text: أمسينا وأمسى الملك لله والحمد لله لا إله إلا الله وحده لا شريك له له الملك وله الحمد وهو على كل شيء قدير رب أسألك خير ما في هذه الليلة وخير ما بعدها وأعوذ بك من شر ما في هذه الليلة وشر ما بعدها رب أعوذ بك من الكسل وسوء الأسقام رب أعوذ بك من عذاب النار وعذاب القبر
adhkar.englishTranslation: We have entered the evening and the dominion is Allah's. All praise is for Allah. There is none worthy of worship except Allah alone, without partner. To Him belongs the dominion and all praise is due to Him, and He is over all things capable. Lord, I ask You for the good of this night and the good that follows it, and I seek refuge in You from the evil of this night and the evil that follows it. Lord, I seek refuge in You from laziness and bad conduct. Lord, I seek refuge in You from the punishment of the Fire and the punishment of the grave.

collections.description: Islamic remembrances before going to sleep

adhkar.text: الحمد لله الذي أطعمنا وسقانا وكفانا وآوانا فكم ممن لا كافي له ولا مؤوى
adhkar.englishTranslation: All praise is for Allah who fed us and gave us drink, and sufficed us and sheltered us. How many have no one to suffice them and no shelter.

adhkar.text: بسم الله الذي لا يضر مع اسمه شيء في الأرض ولا في السماء وهو السميع العليم
adhkar.englishTranslation: In the name of Allah, with whose name nothing in the earth or heavens is harmed, and He is the All-Hearing, the All-Knowing.

adhkar.text: اللهم قني عذابك يوم تبعث عبادك
adhkar.englishTranslation: O Allah, protect me from Your punishment on the Day You resurrect Your servants.

collections.description: Islamic remembrances to recite after prayer

adhkar.text: سبحان الله والحمد لله ولا إله إلا الله والله أكبر
adhkar.englishTranslation: Glory be to Allah, and all praise is due to Allah, and none is worthy of worship except Allah, and Allah is Most Great.

adhkar.text: لا حول ولا قوة إلا بالله
adhkar.englishTranslation: There is no power and no strength except with Allah.
